Dark One/Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer:



Dark One barrel rolls, his wings getting clipped, though he still wa sin the 
air.  He awaited the chance to fire again as he started to turn around.

---

Scattershot sidestepped in the air again, barely dodging the missiles, the 
explosions sending him flying backwards.

---

Nemesis Enforcer flew up, a few blasts hitting his legs and feet.  He fired 
off twenty-five rapid laser blasts from his rifle at Jestorm, followed by 
twelve rapid optic blasts at Jestorm's sternum.
